scenario.description: Scenario for a user who is a Software Engineer at Google, has personal side projects, is involved in community service, and has non-work related accomplishments.

projects.name: Google Search Optimization
projects.description: Worked on improving the efficiency of Google's search algorithm by 15%

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Created a personal blog to share knowledge about software development and machine learning. The blog has over 10,000 monthly visitors.

projects.name: Community Coding Bootcamp
projects.description: Volunteered to teach coding to underprivileged students in the local community. The bootcamp has helped over 50 students learn basic coding skills.

projects.name: Marathon Runner
projects.description: Completed a full marathon in under 4 hours.

messages.content: Hey there! I wanted to update my achievements.
Of course! I'm here to help. What would you like to update?
I've been working on Google Search Optimization at Google and we've improved the efficiency of the search algorithm by 15%.
That's a significant achievement! When did you complete this project?
The project was completed on May 31, 2020.
Great! I've updated that. Do you have any other professional achievements to add?
Yes, I've also been running a personal blog about software development and machine learning. It's been getting over 10,000 monthly visitors.
That's impressive! When did you start the blog?
I started the blog on June 1, 2020.
Excellent! I've added that to your achievements. Is there anything else you'd like to update?

expectedBrags.text: Improved the efficiency of Google's search algorithm by 15%
Started a personal blog about software development and machine learning with over 10,000 monthly visitors
